sourcing.instructions: - Erbium Oxide: Purchase from chemical supply companies or online marketplaces.
steps: - Erbium Oxide: Purchase from chemical supply companies or online marketplaces.
1. Measure out 19.85 g of Erbium Oxide and 66.55 g of Iron(III) Oxide into a mixing bowl.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure out 19.85 g of Erbium Oxide and 66.55 g of Iron(III) Oxide into a mixing bowl.

steps: 1. After 4 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 4 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold.
